subtitle: hey everyone happy new year as 2017 becomes a memory we look back at all
that has transpired and into the future for what may come always from the
present moment looking back it's mind-blowing to see just how much has
happened if you've been following our work you probably saw a number of new
spirit science series that we started we were pretty much making videos about all
the subjects we were passionate about we opened up a food series a source field
series Kabbalah and of course Tarot now all of these series are still open
and we're planning on turning them each into their own full-length movies the
main reason we didn't finish any yet however was the need to finish patch to
row this was our biggest project for the whole year and in between making new
videos there were hours upon hours of card illustrations research and
documentation about the very subtle and intricate connections of the turo it was
actually amazing we unearthed a bit of an informational behemoth here
most people don't know just how intricate Tarot really is so we made a
note to document and describe as much as we possibly could in the simplest and
easiest way to understand it and at the end of the year we finally launched it
seeing the response from patch Tarot was amazing
we actually shipped over a thousand decks in the first month and each deck
is packed and shipped by our own hands of the Spirit house thank you all from
the bottom of our hearts on that note another huge leap for
spirit science this year was the spirit house for the first time we actually
moved our studio into a house where our small team lives and works we were able
to coordinate and get a lot more done this way and are eagerly looking forward
to the next step where we can get a full-on spirit studio to make more
content with a larger team in the last New Year's video we mentioned that our
social media pages were essentially gone with the wind' well after much
deliberation and thanks to many many amazing Souls working together this past
summer we received our Facebook page back along with our Instagram and
Twitter and relaunched them with our new website spirit science central as far as
spirit science goes we are bottlenecking a little bit but in a good way there is
literally so much content that we are eager to create from the nubira movie
the animated hermetica finishing all of our current series in the work going
back and revisiting and upon all of the older spirit science
videos and even a movie that we are calling the apocalypse of Jesus along
with all of that we're in the editing process of the 600 page book of patch
which is the Tarot super book we made for beginners and experts alike as well
as our old uni book which is just about finished and in the reviewing stages
keep an eye out for it we're hoping to get both of these
published in physical print sometime in 2018 today even though our team is still
very small the passion to continue our work is bigger than ever we may not have
created as many videos as we had wanted towards the end of this past year but
with patch Tarot out of the way this should change very soon in 2018 we're
excited to see some bright changes now that the studio is prepared to grow for
those of you who want to support the evolution of spirit science the best two
ways are by pledging your support on patreon and getting a patch to Road deck
this support will go directly to us to bring new people on board and making
more content for you to enjoy finally we would like to extend gratitude to all of
the skeptics out there it's because of you that helped us refine our message
and provide more quality research and sources behind every video thank you to
everyone who has ever believed in us and stood by us through thick and thin all
of these years we are so excited for everything that is to come
Happy New Year and don't forget you have all of the magic within you
